data.actual_result: Nothing, it just says "before:" in the search bar. You must manually type "before:" for it to work.
data.expected_result: The date picker pops up so you can enter the date
data.short_description: Tapping "before:" on search on an iPad doesn't bring up the date picker UI
data.steps_to_repro: - Go on any server - Tap on the search bar - Under search options, tap "before:" - Note that this only on iPads. I've tested it on my iPod and the bug is not there.
